original: 不可思議的武器，以九地之下提煉所得之特殊材料打造，色彩豔麗，上刻怪異文字，蘊含玄奇之能量。擊打時發出怪異聲響，造成擊退傷害同時擾亂敵方心智。
text: An incredible weapon, made of special materials refined under the Nine Earths, with gorgeous colors and weird characters engraved on it, containing mysterious energy. It makes a weird sound when hit, causing knockback damage and disturbing the enemy's mind.
